snippet: Before everyone moves on to Matchday 2 of the Champions League quarterfinals, take a moment to properly honor the sublime ball that Dani Alves sliced into Lionel Messi’s path for the Barcelona’s opening goal on Tuesday.
abstract: Before everyone moves on to Matchday 2 of the Champions League quarterfinals, take a moment to properly honor the sublime ball that Dani Alves sliced into Lionel Messi’s path for the Barcelona’s opening goal on Tuesday.

headline.main: In Praise of Dani Alves's Pass
